name: Orphibs Evolvapalooza
description:
This is a life-simulation "game" which is used to evaluate an assessment tool I'm developing for my PhD thesis.

In this game you must take care of several generations of alien-like creatures and evaluate one of them before moving on to the next generation. Your evaluation will be collected so I can validate my assessment tool. Data will only be collect after the game congratulates you for contributing for science.
